hmLLDP.name: hmLLDP
hmLLDP.contactinfo: Customer Support Postal: Hirschmann Automation and Control GmbH Stuttgarter Str. 45-51 72654 Neckartenzlingen Germany Tel: +49 7127 14 1981 Web: http://www.hicomcenter.com/ E-Mail: hicomcenter@hirschmann.com
hmLLDP.description: The Hirschmann Private LLDP MIB definitions for Platform devices.

hmLLDPAdminStatus.name: hmLLDPAdminStatus
hmLLDPAdminStatus.description: DURABLE: Enables/disables the IEEE802.1AB functionality on this device. If disabled(2), the LLDP protocol is inactive, but the LLDP MIBs can be accessed.

hmLLDPInterfaceTable.name: hmLLDPInterfaceTable
hmLLDPInterfaceTable.description: This table contains variables for each interface of the switch.

hmLLDPIfaceGroupID.name: hmLLDPIfaceGroupID
hmLLDPIfaceGroupID.description: index to identify an interface card. This value is never greater than hmSysGroupCapacity.

hmLLDPIfaceID.name: hmLLDPIfaceID
hmLLDPIfaceID.description: index to identify an interface within an interface card.

hmLLDPIfaceHirmaMode.name: hmLLDPIfaceHirmaMode
hmLLDPIfaceHirmaMode.description: Configure Hirschmann LLDP on this physical port. If an IEEE802.1AB capable device not manufactured by Hirschmann is connected to a port, hmLLDPIfaceHirmaMode should be set to disabled (4) for this port.

hmLLDPIfaceFDBMode.name: hmLLDPIfaceFDBMode
hmLLDPIfaceFDBMode.description: If configured to lldpOnly(1), only received LLDP messages will be used to populate the LLDP-MIB's remTable. If configured to macOnly(2), learned mac addresses out of the switch's forwarding database (FDB) will be used to populate the LLDP-MIB's remTable. If configured to both(3), both received LLDP messages and learned mac addresses out of the switch's forwarding database (FDB) will be used to populate the LLDP-MIB's remTable. If configured to autoDetect(4) and LLDP messages are received on this port, this mode will behave like lldpOnly(1), otherwise it will behave like macOnly(2).

hmLLDPIfaceMaxNeighbors.name: hmLLDPIfaceMaxNeighbors
hmLLDPIfaceMaxNeighbors.description: Configure Hirschmann LLDP on this physical port. This value limits the number of entries in the remTable for this port.

hmLLDPStatsIfTable.name: hmLLDPStatsIfTable
hmLLDPStatsIfTable.description: This table contains variables for each interface of the switch.

hmLLDPStatsIfaceGroupID.name: hmLLDPStatsIfaceGroupID
hmLLDPStatsIfaceGroupID.description: index to identify an interface card. This value is never greater than hmSysGroupCapacity.

hmLLDPStatsIfaceID.name: hmLLDPStatsIfaceID
hmLLDPStatsIfaceID.description: index to identify an interface within an interface card.

hmLLDPStatsIfaceTotalFDBEntryCount.name: hmLLDPStatsIfaceTotalFDBEntryCount
hmLLDPStatsIfaceTotalFDBEntryCount.description: The total number of learned entries in the forwarding database (FDB) for this port.

hmLLDPStatsIfaceTotalEntryCount.name: hmLLDPStatsIfaceTotalEntryCount
hmLLDPStatsIfaceTotalEntryCount.description: The total number of remote connections in the LLDP MIB's remTable for this port.

hmLLDPStatsIfaceIEEEEntryCount.name: hmLLDPStatsIfaceIEEEEntryCount
hmLLDPStatsIfaceIEEEEntryCount.description: The number of remote connections in the LLDP MIB's remTable for this port that were detected because an LLDP message from an IEEE source was received.

hmLLDPStatsIfaceHirmaEntryCount.name: hmLLDPStatsIfaceHirmaEntryCount
hmLLDPStatsIfaceHirmaEntryCount.description: The number of remote connections in the LLDP MIB's remTable for this port that were detected because an LLDP message from an Hirschmann source was received.

hmLLDPStatsIfaceFDBEntryCount.name: hmLLDPStatsIfaceFDBEntryCount
hmLLDPStatsIfaceFDBEntryCount.description: The number of remote connections in the LLDP MIB's remTable for this port that were detected in the forwarding database (FDB) for this port.
